website_summaries.verdict: This brush has both some user-friendly features such as the tunnel design that effectively channels the air of a blow dryer; but the bristles could be better.
pros: Has a tunnel design that adds to its effectiveness when simultaneously blow drying and styling
Rubberized, anti-static bristles with soft handle
cons: Bristles are quite stiff, and the balls occasionally come off the tips

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It's the size I was looking for and the vented base helps to dry my hair quicker. The curved brush head makes styling easy and the bristles are sturdy but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pkram

customer_reviews.title: Use for long on top men's hair
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this brush. It helps his hair to dry quickly and doesn't tangle. He uses it in combined with a blowdryer and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush for thick and curly hair. It has replaced my usual paddle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Chernoff

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Some of the brushes are bent out of the box. Still does the job though. Was hoping the brushes are more rigid. Should still last at least a few months though.
customer_reviews.author: Jambat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good styling brush!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I rated the brush about average. Frankly, I purchased the product for its supposed anti-static properties but found that it produced just about as much static as a traditional brush. I kept the brush simply because it functioned OK and wasn't worth the hassle of sending it back. If you're looking for an anti-static brush, this is probably not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: RGB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Like the design function, weight, and overall use. My only issue was the size of brush, I wish it could be offered in a smaller size to make traveling with easier?
customer_reviews.author: Hele On

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in the shower too!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to do a deep scrub while washing my hair in the shower. I have thick, curly hair with a dandruff problem and this really helps massage the shampoo into the scalp to remove the dandruff. My hair is so much smoother and cleaner when I use it, plus since it has the groves and holes in the back, it doesn't get caked in stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Great brush....
customer_reviews.text: been looking for a vent brush to replace one that is very old and could never find one that was as good...I really like this one
customer_reviews.author: momlon

customer_reviews.title: A Well-Designed Hairbrush at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The design, construction, and spacing of the bristles are perfect for me. The handle size, design, and construction are also optimal. It leaves the desired brush patterns in my hair that is very full, and I use it with light styling gel while my hair is still very damp so I do not take advantage of its' blow drying ventilation benefits. I am a guy in my fifties with fairly short hair and searched through hundreds of brushes online to find this one, and I was not disappointed. I ordered six of them so that they would be handy because you've gotta keep your hair lookin' good - Right?! Good Stuff - Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John Korosi

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Good hair brush, for a few weeks. I’ve only used this brush for about a month now and the bristles are already bending. Overall, I’d probably try a different brush next time.
customer_reviews.author: p spe

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and functional brush I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I have owned in a decade. I can now throw=away the ancient one I have valued and all the ones that didn't live up to expectations! I am going to order 2 more, one for travel suitcase, one for each bathroom. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Its a Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to do. The bristles are pretty far apart so it more parts your hair than brushes it but that's not their fault. Looks like it does in the pic. Prob more effective on longer hair.
customer_reviews.author: snooky1170

customer_reviews.title: Decent hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: The head of this brush is great. The handle is a bit small and slightly uncomfortable to hold. I can get used to it but I would probably look for one with a different handle in the future.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: This brush has everything I like to make it my favorite one ever. The handle, wide vents, curvature, and the feel of the bristles on my scalp are all ideal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The bristles at the end were really pokey and scratched up my head. I had to cut some of the little things on the end so that it wouldnt leave scratch marks on my scalp. Still good product
customer_reviews.author: jessicabearre

customer_reviews.title: Nice Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high expectations even the product has a good review. It is much better than I expected and I use it every day when I dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Yuen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This brush is small. I dont have big hands and it feel tiny. Not sure how a brush offers drying power, but it didn't seem to dry my hair any. The bristles felt like they were clawing my head.I ended up going to the store and purchasing a brush half the price that I can hold comfortably. Not worth the price to me.
customer_reviews.author: mike sauls

customer_reviews.title: Pulls my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a brush that looked like this one and I loved it , but I lost it in my travels. I bought a couple of these brushes, thinking they were the same as the one I lost. However, this one pulls my hair when I use it. I don't care much for it. I gave one to my adult daughter too. She said it pulled her hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Strong and light
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, but light brush that fits my smaller hand very comfortably. A couple of the bristle end nubs have come off already due to letting the brush get too close to the hair dryer, but the brush still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: great Styling Brush
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable in hand, easy to style with, simply one of the better brushes on the market
customer_reviews.author: Banshee

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to find in stores
customer_reviews.text: These type of tunnel vent brushes are impossible to find in stores. Happy to see on Amazon. They work best on my hair. Would like to find out if there's a slightly larger version as well. Brush is very good quality and looks like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bursh
customer_reviews.text: This brush was just what I was looking for. Perfect size. I have somewhat small hands and am an older lady. Nice and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLady

customer_reviews.title: Fragile brush
customer_reviews.text: Ball tips started falling off after less than three months of light use. Otherwise, good brush.
customer_reviews.author: WVU1776

customer_reviews.title: Very good and the price is also great
customer_reviews.text: Very good and the price is also great! Light and a good grip, didn't realise that the handle rubber part is made of tiny hearts, which makes it cool. The boar bristles seem to be real, burnt 1 which fell out and it smelled like burnt hair. Some boar bristles fell out the first time I used it, but very few.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for guys - has a straight edge so I can part my hair easily but doesn't mash it down like a comb does. I bought a second brush to keep in my gym bag and it hasn't lost any bristles rolling around with shoes, etc. Just a brush, but the straight side is useful and it can take some abuse. Pretty much all I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very hard. I’m not tender headed at all but these really hurt they didn’t glide through my hair.
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is on the flimsy side and could be a bit bigger. I wouldn't buy it again, it just sets in a drawer filled with other brushes and things I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: djc

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: I have medium curly hair and wanted a vented brush that better gripped my hair to blow it out. The boat bristles do the trick, and my hair straightens MUCH better! It’s large, so I can eat much more at once than going in small sections with a round boat brush. After a couple practice sections, I don’t have to touch up with a flat iron. I’ve already recommended this brush to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi A. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Piece came off
customer_reviews.text: Few of the plastic stick came off, very fragile material, neat to becareful when brushing.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Definitely less static helping me with my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Very good brush and I will recommend this product to anyone who looking for good less static brush.
customer_reviews.author: Irena Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great vented brush foe the money. Lightweight but doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Minshew

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK...
customer_reviews.text: Hair brush for my thin old hair. It was just OK, could have used more teeth but that's my fault. lt is what it is. Probably good for young thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: GRT

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description...........bristles not soft!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brush for it's "soft bristles". I know "soft" is a relative term and compared to my wire brush, for scraping paint, they are soft but not for brushing hair. Disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Retro#`

customer_reviews.title: bristles are not long enough
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice brush but the bristles are too short for lifting my hair to dry
customer_reviews.author: frogcoach

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very effective vent brush for navigating long thick fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Hard2Please

customer_reviews.title: Causes Static
customer_reviews.text: It’s useful for drying, but holding the brush does cramp my hand after 5-10 minutes. It was easy enough to clean. It leaves my hair staticky, though.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Miller

customer_reviews.title: goid
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hairbrush. Soft on the scalp yet efficient. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Kattalin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is Not only great for blow drying and styling hair, but also works well for brushing out wet hair before blow drying.
customer_reviews.author: NewsyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: It really is a great brush, and it is surprisingly static free! I'm back to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Product Review by Kris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hairbrush, worth of your money
customer_reviews.text: What can we say about a brush? It’s in the title. It does the job and well. The bristles are tipped with a soft end which is nice if your skin is a little sensitive to a more prickly plastic end.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA DUGAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy blow drying tool
customer_reviews.text: Blow drying hair is a breeze and works on ethnic curly hair that ranges from 4a - 4c but I am relaxed so not sure on natural hair
customer_reviews.author: Chantrice Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, my husband loves using it on his hair. Seems like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kjersten

customer_reviews.title: So nice! Happiness!
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek vented hairbrush arrived on time. It is pretty and well constructed. We are happy with it. It looks just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable grip, my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Okay brush, handle doesn’t grip/feel good to hold in my opinion. Decently durable. Could be smoother on the scalp, just average. Shipped quick
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and manageable. Does the job in record time. This is a brush that will outlive several generations.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush so much that this is my 2nd time buying it.
customer_reviews.author: RV Living

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brush
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a little stiffer than I would like, but overall it's a good brush.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Bucher

customer_reviews.title: My go-to brush
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional Barber in a busy shop and this is my go to brush for blow-dry styling on any hair texture. Great brush!
customer_reviews.author: Dru Meskan

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard plastic teeth. No give what so ever.  If you like a super hard no give brush then this is for you...not me!
customer_reviews.text: Brush is very hard bristled. Am not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I look cool with it in my pocket uncle rico
customer_reviews.author: Darin Carner

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find a vent brush like this in my area
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a vent brush like this in my area, so when I saw it on Amazon I quickly ordered it. It came promptly and was just want I was looking for.The product is well made and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for this type brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an easy to clean brush - this is it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, light weight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, light weight and easy to handle. Since the brush is vented, using it with a blow dryer makes drying/styling hair easy & fast.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is the boss of all brushes. It's strange and can handle all types of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Smith

customer_reviews.title: I recently purchased this brush and am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I used to have half round vented brushes made by Goody, but have been looking the last few years to no avail. I recently purchased this brush and am happy with it, except for the shorter bristles which don't work as well on my thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good brush, I like the vents, helps when cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Trentham

customer_reviews.title: Low quality . Very few bristles
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t offered compared to other brushes that had way more bristles. Seems like it has just as many as other brands but has less indeed. Don’t buy it because there are no returns. Invest in a better brush instead
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out
customer_reviews.text: I saw loose bristles in the bag and just thought, oh well it just happens during shipping. Nope it happens as you use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but a little too small
customer_reviews.text: I find both the brush handle and head a little too short to use comfortably. Otherwise, I like the brush a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean! Handy brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush, great for styling and easy to clean! Does not make ur hair stick up from static.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do exactly as the baasha curved vent in strait version
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the handle it's to short uncomfortable to hold to many lines of bristles to wide
customer_reviews.author: pierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great to keep in the gym bag and at work
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair and this brush is perfect for me it was Missing when we moved and I don’t get out much I nobody new what I wanted so I looked on amazon and I found it I’m so happy
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: In about a week several of the plastic brush tips have already fallen off the brush. Other than that it's a fairly solid brush.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a brush like this for many years. I purchased one at beauty salon and have never been able to replace it. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Good brush.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to build volume and distribute my pre styler throughmy hair. Amazing brush that will give good volume for men during the blowdrying process with no tug or pull at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed the improvement in my sister's hair due to the new brush she was using so I immediately ordered one. It makes so much difference that I don't feel I need to wear a hat to cover up the thinness! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Richardson

customer_reviews.title: You need this brush
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a brush like this for awhile. Great brush dried hair fast easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sugargirl

customer_reviews.title: strong and stable, good product
customer_reviews.text: its a good & strong brush if you got strong here.. thats perfect for you..
customer_reviews.author: Shoshan Nissim

customer_reviews.title: This brush is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a long time for a brush to replace an old Sebring vent brush I've had for years. This brush is perfect!!! It is the same size and has a soft rubbery grip. It is very easy to use and does a really good job with my hair. So glad I found this brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great for styling with clay
customer_reviews.text: works good to style hair with clay. I have short hair and little curly but can use it to style.
customer_reviews.author: H M Iftekhar Akter

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gentle bush and it doesn’t pull out a lot of hair. Nice grooming product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and is made strong so it can last
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Short Bristles
customer_reviews.text: The photos are deceiving. The bristles are only 1/2" high. The bristles on my other air vent brushes are 3/4" high. I have short hair and this brush does not grab the hair well. It may work for people with super short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this brush is my favorite for de-tangling
customer_reviews.text: After my hair went gray, it became wire-y, frizzy, and tended to tangle. I do color it, so that helps, but this brush is my favorite for de-tangling, especially after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Hikari

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tips started coming off the bristles the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L.

customer_reviews.title: Baasha brush
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what I expected. Thought the brusil would be softer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Good For Wet Hair
customer_reviews.text: I needed a brush to use in my wet hair to spread conditioner throughout and catch as many loose hairs as possible. The grip on the handle is terrific when working with slippery, wet hands.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Walsh

customer_reviews.title: My first vented brush....
customer_reviews.text: Simple and comfortable design. It works well for my medium length hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Guevarra

customer_reviews.title: Help to shape my hair with hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Light, so far sturdy, and pretty nice to use when making a hairstyle
customer_reviews.author: Mo Shen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brush ever!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is comfortable to use, lightweight, and doesn't snag or pull my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Color fades
customer_reviews.text: The black color fades and will attach to your fingers
customer_reviews.author: Gekai Liao

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well and have definitely noticed a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lauman

customer_reviews.title: Rough on hair.
customer_reviews.text: When I used it, it felt like it was tearing on my hair. Granted I have curly hair, but I didn’t feel comfortable continuing to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for blow drying!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic brush! I have fine hair but I have a ton of it and I've had trouble finding brushes that would actually hold on to my hair as I blew it dry. This one really works! whatever that rubber material is, it really will hold on to your hair! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: kathy adreon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size. Fits good in my hand and doesn't take up much space. Seems to be a pretty good brush.
customer_reviews.author: Winifred Duncan

customer_reviews.title: best brush ever
customer_reviews.text: No more tears for my little one, best brush ever!
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Runs through my hair the way it should and better than other vent brushes out there!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality of this brush! Received order quickly!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the brush, it's strong enough to comb through my thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trusty Vent Brush Handles Hair with Ease
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find this brush on Amazon. It reduces friction and adds body when used with a dryer to lift hair. I am buying one for my hairdresser.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Wallain

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ball came off bristle after a few uses and started scratching scalp. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice brush, function
customer_reviews.text: As a guy, I initially thought, "that's a lot for a piece of plastic and rubber." However, when I first held ran it through my hair, I knew I'd be ordering another for my car. Really nice brush, function, form, quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...time will tell how long the bristle tips will last
customer_reviews.author: Nanni y

customer_reviews.title: The feel of this brush is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this brush! I use it on my hair and my 🐈 s!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Perko

customer_reviews.title: Love results with blow-drying.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this type of brush in a long time because I have been trying to protect my hair from undue damage, but I took a chance on this brush. It doesn't pull my tangles and it works great with blow-drying. I love this brush with my blow-dryer versus my round brush. My hair doesn't take as long to dry either. Glad I took a chance on this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rare Heart Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Received in a very timely manner. Product is excellent! I have searched high and low for a real “vent” brush. Most of the ones that I have found in local stores, and I mean beauty chains, are made of hard plastic; not pleasant against the scalp or good for your hair. Then if you do find a good one - it’s $20. This product is the real deal for a realistic price, because you know (ladies) you need at least 3 brushes to style your hair these days. Great purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bopp

customer_reviews.title: cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased cheap hair brushes and very expensive hair brushes. And this one compares to some of the best I've used. It's inexpensive, yet worth every penny for long, thick hair. The bristles have held up well and none have broken. The size and shape of the overall brush is very comfortable to use. It detangles my crazy morning hair no problem, without much pulling, quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Eif

customer_reviews.title: Too abrasive for my scalp
customer_reviews.text: Idk what is was about this brush but I've used it for nearly a year and it started pulling out my hair. My scalp would start to hurt when brushing my hair. I thought it was just me getting older and my hair was falling out faster from stress. I've stopped using it for about two weeks and no longer have scalp pain when brushing, though my hair still seems to be shedding a lot. Came on Amazon to write this review because maybe others might be experiencing it too.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. It is so easy on the hair yet very sturdy and good a brushing down thick manes. I use this for both my girls’ hair. The little one has thin very straight hair. My oldest one has extremely thick straight hair. This brush is a lifesaver. I’m able to brush their hair in the mornings for school with a lot of ease and in no time they are both done. I am very happy and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dj mom

product_meta.title: Baasha Hair Brush, Vent Brush For Men & Women, Vent Brushes For Hair, Vented Brush For Blow Drying, Mens Short Hair Brush With Ball Tipped Bristles, Best Mens Vented Brush For Wet or Dry Hair - Black
feature_bullets: ERGONOMIC HANDLE - Soft gel grip conforms to your hand for more control and comfort
FAST & GENTLE BLOW DRYING - Vented design allows air to pass through the brush for faster drying and styling

STYLING WITH EASE - High quality vent brush for blow drying, hair brush for styling, soft hair brush for men and women. Create the latest and greatest hair style with Baasha vent brush for your professional event or special date!
ANTI STATIC SOFT BRISTLES - Vented brush with sturdy but soft bristles that make detangling wet or dry hair a breeze. Works well for all-purpose styling on all hair lengths and textures
SCALP MASSAGE EFFECT - Ball tip bristles deliver scalp massage effect through hair brush which can stimulate scalp circulation, promote hair growth, and help keep your scalp and hair healthy
